boardgame.description: Masmorra: Dungeons of Arcadia is a fast-paced, dice-driven dungeon crawl board game set in the Arcadia Quest universe where players control Heroes that explore three levels of a dungeon filled with monsters, traps and treasure! Bosses, special rooms and countless surprises await the Heroes, but only one can be the first to reach the final level and become the undisputed champion of the Realm!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Masmorra, players get to roll and re-roll a pool of Dice that guides their actions for their turn, and a unique dungeon is created as players lay down tiles while exploring it and fighting off monsters that are represented by special dice! But Heroes must also be aware of opponent Heroes, as they'll be able to use cards to disrupt their carefully laid-out plans!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is an in-shrink copy of the Masmorra Kickstarter edition. It includes both the core game and the Dungeoneer box full of stretch goals! Will ship USPS Priority and will calculate based on zip code when you buy.

New-in-shrink, in-hand Kickstarter Dungeoneer pledge, still in original unopened shipping box. -includes core box + kickstarter stretch goals box + Monsters Dice Set add-on + Arcadia Crossover Kit add-on -set includes 5 pairs of exclusive dice, 5 exclusive treasure chests, 14 exclusive hero minis Purchase price is approx. cost of pledge + 5.9% (to cover fees) Ships from Falls Church, VA (22042) via lowest-cost insurable option of USPS, UPS, or FedEx, within 1 business day of receipt of payment. I have a mail scale and purchase postage digitally, so will provide you with exact shipping cost including discounts for online purchase of postage. I am able to offer local pickup on weekends in Arlington (infant + job limits my availability and travel options). This is a non-smoking home without pets, and I take great care to maintain my games, even those that are played heavily.

Masmorra: Dungeons of Arcadia is a fast-paced, dice-driven dungeon crawl board game set in the Arcadia Quest universe where players control Heroes that explore three levels of a dungeon filled with monsters, traps and treasure! Bosses, special rooms and countless surprises await the Heroes, but only one can be the first to reach the final level and become the undisputed champion of the Realm! This is the Dungeoneer! Pledge: Masmorra core box + Exclusive Quan Hero + All Applicable Stretch Goals Also included at this price: + Kickstarter Exclusive Arcadia Crossover Kit + Kickstarter Exclusive Promo Monster Dice Set + Kickstarter Exclusive Treasure Chest Pack + Kickstarter Exclusive Luke, the Lucky Accept Paypal or IBAN with BIC. Bank transfer is preferred. Private Sale. Game is in my possession and still in shrink. Any questions just ask. You will only pay the shipping you want and need.

Masmorra: Dungeons of Arcadia is a fast-paced, dice-driven dungeon crawl board game set in the Arcadia Quest universe where players control Heroes that explore three levels of a dungeon filled with monsters, traps and treasure! Bosses, special rooms and countless surprises await the Heroes, but only one can be the first to reach the final level and become the undisputed champion of the Realm! This is the Dungeoneer! Pledge: Masmorra core box + Exclusive Quan Hero + All Applicable Stretch Goals (check out the cool minis, all compatible with the Arcadia Quest universe). Accept Paypal or IBAN with BIC. Bank transfer is preferred. Private Sale. Game arrived in Vienna and is still in shrink. Any questions just ask. You will only pay the shipping you want and need.
